name: Beession Impossible
description:
Hey guys, welcome to this little game I've made for LudumDare 48.

This is my first LD ,I was so excited that I forgot to keep checking the time, so expect a lot of unfinished stuff and a few bugs (yeah, ran out of time again, it happens).

Thanks for playing and I hope you have fun

Source code

-------

Controls:

W - Jump
A/D - Left/Right
Mouse Left Click - Fire
